title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item should disappear from the PDF preview.
EB: In the PDF preview, the label should disappear when the display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label to the document. 
2. Open the 'Properties' view. 
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property of the label to 'none' in the 'Properties' view.
